Banner.Description: Seasoned Full Stack Developer with 6+ years in Finance, E-Commerce, and Customer Service. Proven track record in building scalable RESTful Web Services, Microservices, and high-quality UIs. Expertise in Java, Node.js, PHP. Thrives in Agile (SCRUM) environments, excels in collaboration, and consistently delivers exceptional results as a dynamic team member.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 6 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with Laravel and Mysql. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Software developer
Description: Collaborated with product management to gather requirements, plan feature releases, and ensure alignment with business goals, resulting in increased customer satisfaction.
Designed and implemented REST APIs using Node.js, which supported critical functionalities in Call Center Management systems and reduced memory usage by 15%.
Designed and maintained database schemas with MySQL and MongoDB, ensuring optimal performance and achieving 99.9% uptime.

Creation and maintenance of a second Monitoring Platform Done in Angular, Angular Material, Laravel, Mysql, RxJS, Sass with graphics (configurable), alarm system, and user management and configuration of general parameters.
Delivered high-quality solutions with backend technologies, working with an international team to meet business needs and ensure that the solutions were scalable, maintainable, and easy to use.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Programmer Analyst
Description: Developed opportunity study documents and project charter.
Prepared project concept, plan, and operational concept.
Implemented frontend, backend, and database design.
Installed and maintained network systems, hardware, and software.
Established technical support and trained users.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
